Question
========

Myrte examines the relationship between maternal depression and child problem behavior. She suspects that the positive relationship between maternal depression and child problem behavior is weaker as mothers have higher self-control.

What type of multivariate relationship is involved here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple causes
* Spurious relationship
* Interaction
* Chain relationship

Solution
========

The strength of the association between maternal depression and child problem behavior does not disappear when statistically controlling for maternal self-control, but it becomes weaker as mothers have higher self-control. In other words, the strength of the association depends on how high mothers score on self-control.

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
